questions.explanation:
gnu.

	'Altered'=new, which sounds like 'gnu'. This is a homophone clue.

questions.text: No! Canada is chewed up by huge snake!
Making fun of fowl known for imitation.
questions.explanation:
mockingbird & mocking bird.

	Making fun of= mocking followed by fowl=bird

questions.text: Ape lord is knocked for a loop by spotted cat.
Dorm- part of house for fluffy European rodent?
A flightless bird tears a scary sow to pieces.
The most rich land holds the largest bird.
Every canteloupe is diced for colorful lizard.
Egg cell matures into North American wild dog.
17th Greek letters hold no rice cooked for horned mammal.
A word for a graceful marine mammal is the same as the Spanish for freedom from affectation.
African monkey- a blessing!- holds two blood types.
questions.explanation:
baboon.

	'Boon' holds three blood types- a and b.

questions.text: Big carnivore munches crab bake- including last of shell.
questions.explanation:
black bear.

	'Crab bake' and 'l' -last of 'shell'- anagrammed.

questions.text: Pounce! Rip! Tear it up! Ouch, this thing has quills!
